availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky farm laborer. Virginia native. Married Hannah J. Hudson Gordon in 1858.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-029-0583. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 7. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Mason County, Marriages, 1858, Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. “Robert D Gordon (1840-1901),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 8510432, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=8510432&ref=acom (accessed June 14, 2017).
